channel.title: gradle on Shermans's Notes
channel.description: Recent content in gradle on Shermans's Notes

item.title: Java and Gradle Notes
item.description: Yay, build tools! OK, here we go. I’m working using Java now, so of course this means I have to learn a bit more about the build tools and dependacy managers that are out there now. As far as I can see there are really two major contenders out there, maven and gradle. Both of these are combined dependancy managers and build tools each aimed at being “THE ONE TRUE WAY” of doing things.
